channel.title: Need some help! plox
channel.description:
Hey, i`ve been working on summoning and stuff and loads of pepole on my server kill the other players on my server so i wonder how i can add so you only can attack with an summonedpet in wild :confused:
Mite not understand:P if you dont then just say it and i try to explain better :)
